SELECT COUNT(*) FROM I_BOARD WHERE DEL_DATE IS NULL AND BOD_TYPE = #{bodType, jdbcType=CHAR}
AND (TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR CONTENTS LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
